projects.title: FlavorMetrics Restaurant Analytics
projects.description: End-to-end restaurant analytics platform with data pipelines for menu optimization, customer insights, and operational metrics
projects.longDescription: A comprehensive data engineering solution for restaurant analytics featuring automated ETL pipelines, real-time data processing, and interactive dashboards for menu performance tracking, customer behavior analysis, and operational efficiency metrics.

projects.title: Sentiment Analysis Web App
projects.description: ML-powered sentiment analysis application using AWS SageMaker for model training and deployment
projects.longDescription: A machine learning web application that performs real-time sentiment analysis on text data. Built using AWS SageMaker for model training and deployment, with a Python backend and interactive frontend for visualizing sentiment predictions.

projects.title: Healthcare Analytics Platform
projects.description: Healthcare data analytics solution for processing clinical data and generating actionable insights
projects.longDescription: A data engineering project focused on healthcare analytics, featuring ETL pipelines for processing clinical and patient data, data quality validation, and interactive dashboards for healthcare metrics and KPI tracking.

projects.title: Stock Market Analysis
projects.description: Stock market data analysis pipeline for trend identification and portfolio analytics
projects.longDescription: A data analysis project for stock market insights, featuring data pipelines for collecting and processing market data, trend analysis algorithms, and visualization tools for portfolio performance tracking.
